title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1488/90 of 31 May 1990 fixing for the 1990/91 marketing year the reference prices for lemons
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1488/90
of 31 May 1990
fixing for the 1990/91 marketing year the reference prices for lemons
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1990/91 marketing year, the reference prices for fresh lemons (CN code 0805 30 10), expressed in ecus per 100 kilograms net of packed products of class I, of all sizes, shall be as follows:
- June: 54,59,
- July and August: 60,82,
- September: 56,33,
- October: 50,57,
- November to April: 47,15,
- May: 47,73.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 June 1990.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 31 May 1990.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
